Package ch.ethz.mxquery.model.ft

Class Summary
AnyAllOption FTAnyAllOption: FTWords [any, all, all words, any word, phrase]
FTCaseMatchOption Case Match Option: upper case, lower case, case sensitive, case insensitive
FTContent  
FTDistance FTDistance (Positional Filter): distance at least, at most, exactly i, from i to j words, sentences, paragraphs
FTExtensionMatchOption FTExtension Match Option
FTLangDepFactory Factory for language-dependent features of XQuery Full Text
FTLanguageMatchOption FTLanguage Match Option
FTOrder FTOrder: whether Linguistic Tokens are in ascending order
FTPositional  
FTScope  
FTStopWordsMatchOption FTStopWord Match Option
FTThesaurusMatchOption FTThesaurus Match Option
FTWindow FTWindow (Positional Filter): window i words, paragraph, sentences
MatchOption MatchOption: implementation of MatchOption
Range implementation of a Range in FT
